name: City 3310 RTX
description:
There is a problem with running the game in certain browsers under certain conditions, chrome seemed to work for my friends but not for me. Edge was the only browser that worked for me.

I have tried all combinations of WebGL compression settings, even off altogether, yet these behaviors still exhibited. Let me know if you know anything about this!

This is a high res version of my Nokia 3310 game jam game, see This version for the original.
